channel.title: Left 4 Dead 2
channel.description:
So what do you all think? i thought the first one was good, but theres something about it, the graphics look poor, game play felt cheap, and the thing is, its built on the source engine? so why not the type of feel as half life 2? i know properties can be changed but, i just want your views on it.
cheers :retard:

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: DinoThrasher
item.description:
CTID:

I actually liked it as a change.

It just goes to show that fucked up stuff still goes on while it’s a perfect day outside, as opposed to zombie apocalypses only going on during night and with terrible story weather.

Agreed. I think the only thing really lost is the feeling of horror but the game was never really scary to begin with, just face paced and somewhat startling so I don’t really mind the change.

If anything I think it’s an improvement since the game jumps out more as being a unique twist on the zombie survival genre and not just a bunch of cliche’s thrown together into a co-op survival game. A well done co-op survival game, but still.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Spycrabz
item.description:
Soup:

Uh, I’m guessing you haven’t heard about the DLC?

I meant replacing the current Survivors, not just NPCS. Silly.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
CTID:

Well yes, but my point was that I don’t know why you’d want to be able to experience something that makes the game a hell of a lot harder.

Partly because it makes the game more challenging, and lets the AI director control the environment precisely, partly because it looks awesome.

I want all the L4D1 survivors in L4D2. If only I was on the list of people who could ask for voice-overs from Valve…

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Fancy_Pants
item.description:
I tried to start the game for the first time in a month today, turns out valve made my game stop working since I reskinned coach to look like mimi bobeck. I had to delete pak_01.dir entirely and then verify the stupid game files just to get my game working again.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
I actually liked it as a change.

It just goes to show that fucked up stuff still goes on while it’s a perfect day outside, as opposed to zombie apocalypses only going on during night and with terrible story weather.

Acristoff:

I think that might have been an intentional feature of that campaign, derpy herpy durpa hurp.

Well yes, but my point was that I don’t know why you’d want to be able to experience something that makes the game a hell of a lot harder.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Gymdan
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

I have the game, it’s a good game.

It’s just a lot of it seems to be gimmicky fanservice items that are impracticable or over-the-top. It’s also very silly compared to the first one, and that I do not like.

Yeah, I can see what you’re saying there. It does feel a little more happy over all(lighting, textures, characters) but that doesn’t really bother me. Underlying the whole game is amazing gameplay and that’s really the most important thing, even if it feels gimmicky.
Now, I’m saying this having not played L4D in… Months at the least so I can’t really judge effectively, maybe I’ll try L4D again and see if it feels a lot less gimmicky and happy.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Madcat1030
item.description:
The environment/models felt TF2-ey at times. Coach just looked like the cartooniest thing in the world… I’m not saying it looked exactly like TF2 does, but all the survivors felt… TOO vibrant. I understand they had to make them stand out above the hordes of zombies, but making them look fake (as opposed to the REAL-looking zombies [lol…]), just didn’t seem to do it for me.

Hard Rain: favorite level. but the starting area (while it’s still not raining) just felt fake. Coming back and through the shitstorm it was awesome. Maybe it’s just the lighting that I found off…

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Magical Master:

Well, I never played the original…so if I might ask, how is that different from the original?

The original was a lot more simplistic, whether that’s good or bad depends on how you look at it. It was also much darker, much more atmospheric. The game felt more “Everyone is dead or infected, society’s collapsed, and the government has given up on us! We gotta get the hell out of here…” and less “Hell yeah, lets go kill zombies and play carnival games!”.

Gymdan:

Well, from what I’ve seen most of you seem to be making judgments but haven’t bought the game(not judging you here, just pointing it out).
I own the game and I can vouch that it didn’t need to be an expansion, it is very well designed and though the lighting does bring out some small flaws here and there, unless you’re trying to shoot machinima in it or something(which I very highly doubt in L4D2) then it’s fine, and even if that was the case it still wouldn’t mean much.
The kind of flaws I’m talking about are very minuscule like walls looking unnatural, and I’m pretty sure I remember that kind of thing in L4D anyway.
So if you’re thinking “I’ll wait till it drops in price”, I’ve got no problem with that. I wanted to as well but I didn’t see any deals for a few weeks so my patience wore out, but if you aren’t going to get the game because it came out so fast, definitely get it, its worth it by a long shot.
(Yes this is my first post, I’ve hung around the site but haven’t had the give a care to make an account till now)

I have the game, it’s a good game.

It’s just a lot of it seems to be gimmicky fanservice items that are impracticable or over-the-top. It’s also very silly compared to the first one, and that I do not like.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
I miss L4D1.

L4D2 feels really gimmicky to me. It’s all about kill, gore, kill, kill, gore, chainsaw, baseball bat, giant gun that makes more gore.

I think it’s overdone, and that they’re trying way too hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.dc:creator: Soup
item.description:
Android11x:

so leik… I know I’m really behind, but Hard Rain gave me a hard-on. I played it with my pal on the Xbox and I gave me shivers. I LOVED IT!

It’s possibly my favourite chapter. Need to play it on 360 so I can see the rain though.

Hero_of_Time96:

Does anyone know if the command “exec 360controller” still works for L4D2 like it did for TF2? No need to start a flame war, I’m just curious to what its like to use the controller.

Yeah, it works just fine. I occasionally use a controller, sometimes feels a lot more immersive for me.
